plays.text: Penalty to Jan Hrdina 2 minutes for Hooking Ian Laperriere
Penalty to David Vyborny 2 minutes for Hooking Alex Tanguay
Penalty to Marek Svatos 2 minutes for Slashing Bryan Berard
Penalty to Jody Shelley 2 minutes for Slashing Cody McCormick
Goal scored by Alex Tanguay assisted by Milan Hejduk AND Patrice Brisebois
Penalty to Duvie Westcott 2 minutes for Holding Alex Tanguay
Goal scored by Marek Svatos assisted by Brett McLean AND Patrice Brisebois
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Interference Rick Nash
Penalty to Cody McCormick 5 minutes for Fighting(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Nikolai Zherdev AND Rick Nash
Penalty to Rostislav Klesla 2 minutes for Tripping Marek Svatos
Goal scored by Rick Nash assisted by Nikolai Zherdev
Penalty to Duvie Westcott 2 minutes for Closing Hand on Puck(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Duvie Westcott 2 minutes for Hooking Brett McLean
Nikolai Zherdev shootout attempt against David Aebischer with a Wristshot results in a SAVE!
Alex Tanguay shootout attempt against Pascal Leclaire with a Wristshot results in a GOAL!
